summary: [simple_description] A 3D multiplayer game using WebGL and Socket.io for real-time interactions.

directories.summary: Source code containing both client and server implementations for the 3D multiplayer game.
Client-side game implementation using WebGL for 3D rendering and networking for multiplayer.
Server implementation handling game state, physics, and multiplayer synchronization.
TypeScript type definitions for game entities and networking protocols.
Compiled output for both client and server code.
